mapper.select:
select
from od_order_settlement where is_del = 0 and order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_inner = 0

select expense_type_id,sum(income_amount_cny) income_amount_cny from od_order_settlement where is_del = 0 and order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and income_amount_cny <> 0 group by expense_type_id
